TSTG.TooltipText: Click to toggle grid snapping for selected tokens
TSTG.DragMeasurementSettingHint: Configure how Drag Measurement looks when dragging an unsnapped token.
TSTG.DragMeasurementSettingIgnoreGridNoH: Euclidean Measurement and No Grid Highlighting
TSTG.DragMeasurementSettingGridNoHighlig: Gridded Measurement and No Grid Highlighting
TSTG.KeybindingToggleHint: Toggle grid snapping for the selected token(s)
